data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Melaka, Malaysia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Melaka, Malaysia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Melaka to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Melaka to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Father, we pray that the people of Melaka, Malaysia will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.
Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Urdu people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, please convict the believers in Melaka, Malaysia to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Melaka.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Melaka to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...
